metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11696 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the __hash_open function in lib/dbm/src/hash.c in Mozilla Network Security Services (NSS) allows context-dependent attackers to have unspecified impact using a crafted cert8.db file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Upstream NSS will not be fixing this issue. this is an issue in libnssdbm. NSS 3.35 made SQLite the default datastore. NSS 3.49 stopped building the legacy datastore.

criterions.comment: nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
